Row.REMARKS: IF USED, IDENTIFIES THE EXERCISE THE MESSAGE PERTAINS TO. NOT TO BE USED IN CONJUNCTION WITH SET OPER.
IF USED, IDENTIFIES THE OPERATION THE MESSAGE PERTAINS TO. NOT TO BE USED IN CONJUNCTION WITH SET EXER.
SPECIFIES THE MESSAGE IDENTIFIER, FOR EXAMPLE "XXX", MESSAGE ORIGINATOR, AND OTHER DETAILS OF THE MESSAGE.
IF USED, SPECIFIES THE SERIAL LETTER, COMMUNICATIONS TYPE, ORIGINATOR, DATE/TIME OF REFERENCE, AND OTHER DETAILS ABOUT THE REFERENCE(S) TO THE MESSAGE, REPEATING AS NECESSARY
PROVIDES THE DATE-TIME GROUP THE MESSAGE WAS PREPARED OR AUTHORISED FOR RELEASE.
PROVIDES THE UNIT IDENTIFIER, COUNTRY OF THE WORLD, ARMED SERVICE, SPECIALIST ROLE, ORGANISATION TYPE, AND COMMAND LEVEL OF THE UNIT WHO PREPARED THE MESSAGE OR AUTHORISED ITS RELEASE.
IDENTIFIES MAPS OR LOCATIONS REFERENCED IN THE MESSAGE.
PROVIDES THE SHIP'S PREFIX AND NAME, MERCHANT SHIP TYPE, INTERNATIONAL RADIO CALL SIGN, VOYAGE NUMBER, AND OTHER DETAILS OF THE SHIP.
PROVIDES DETAILS OF THE SHIP'S MOVEMENTS.
PROVIDES DETAILS OF THE SHIP'S ABILITY TO DISCHARGE CARGO.
IF USED, ENTER ANY SPECIAL BERTHING REQUIREMENTS.
DETAILS OF SHIP'S DIMENSIONS, DRAFT, LENGTH, BEAM AND CARGO CAPACITY.
PROVIDES DETAILS OF THE STATUS OF THE CARGO MANIFEST.
PROVIDES WEIGHT AND VOLUME OF TOTAL CARGO ONBOARD THE SHIP.

Row.SET_FORMAT_NAME: CARGO FOR EACH PORT OF CALL
Row.REMARKS: PROVIDES WEIGHT AND VOLUME AND INDICATOR CODE WHETHER CARGO FOR THIS PORT OF CALL WILL REQUIRE TRANSHIPMENT.

CARGO DETAILS INCLUDING LINE REFERENCE NUMBER (LRN ) (ENTERED IN ASCENDING ORDER), CONSIGNEE, LOAD TYPE, NUMBER OF CARGO PIECES, WEIGHT, VOLUME, CARGO CONTAINER TYPE OR BARGE NUMBER. THE LRN TIES TOGETHER SETS 1CGODETL, 5DKCGO AND 5HAZARD.
STOWAGE DETAILS OF THE HATCH OR DECK CARGO. LRN ENTERED IN ASCENDING ORDER AND MUST APPEAR IN SET 1CGODETL AS WELL. ENTRIES IN FIELDS 4 AND 5 MAY REQUIRE ENTRIES IN FIELD 4 OF 1CGODETL.
IF USED, PROVIDES DATA ENTRY IDENTIFICATION, IMDG INDICATOR, AND OTHER DETAILS OF HAZARDOUS CARGO. THE LRN SHOULD APPEAR IN ASCENDING ORDER BUT IS NOT ABSOLUTELY REQUIRED.
IF USED, PROVIDES THE ON-CARRYING SHIP NAME.
IF SET TRANSHIP USED THEN SET GENTEXT IS COMPLETED. ENTER WHO HAS TRASSHIPMENT RESPONSIBILITY FOR THE CARGO.

Row.SET_FORMAT_NAME: CARGO FOR EACH PORT OF CALL
Row.REMARKS: PROVIDES DETAILS OF THE TOTAL CARGO TO BE TRANSSHIPPED TO NEXT PORT OF CALL.

CARGO DETAILS INCLUDING LINE REFERENCE NUMBER (LRN ) (ENTERED IN ASCENDING ORDER), CONSIGNEE, LOAD TYPE, NUMBER OF CARGO PIECES, WEIGHT, VOLUME, CARGO CONTAINER TYPE OR BARGE NUMBER. THE LRN TIES TOGETHER SETS 1CGODETL, 5DKCGO AND 5HAZARD.
STOWAGE DETAILS OF THE HATCH OR DECK CARGO. LRN ENTERED IN ASCENDING ORDER AND MUST APPEAR IN SET 1CGODETL AS WELL. ENTRIES IN FIELDS 4 AND 5 MAY REQUIRE ENTRIES IN FIELD 4 OF 1CGODETL.
IIF USED, PROVIDES DATA ENTRY IDENTIFICATION, IMDG INDICATOR, AND OTHER DETAILS OF HAZARDOUS CARGO. THE LRN SHOULD APPEAR IN ASCENDING ORDER BUT IS NOT ABSOLUTELY REQUIRED.
END OF SEGMENT
END OF SEGMENT
IF USED, IDENTIFIES THE EXERCISE THE MESSAGE PERTAINS TO. NOT TO BE USED IN CONJUNCTION WITH SET OPER.
IF USED, IDENTIFIES THE OPERATION THE MESSAGE PERTAINS TO. NOT TO BE USED IN CONJUNCTION WITH SET EXER.
SPECIFIES THE MESSAGE IDENTIFIER, FOR EXAMPLE "XXX", MESSAGE ORIGINATOR, AND OTHER DETAILS OF THE MESSAGE.
IF USED, SPECIFIES THE SERIAL LETTER, COMMUNICATIONS TYPE, ORIGINATOR, DATE/TIME OF REFERENCE, AND OTHER DETAILS ABOUT THE REFERENCE(S) TO THE MESSAGE, REPEATING AS NECESSARY.
IF USED, PROVIDES THE DATE-TIME GROUP THE MESSAGE WAS PREPARED OR AUTHORIZED FOR RELEASE.

PROVIDES THE UNIT DESIGNATOR, UNIT SIZE, NATIONALITY, UNIT ROLE INDICATOR(S), HIGHER FORMATION NAME AND ARMED SERVICE OR CIVILIAN AGENCY OF THE UNIT THAT DRAFTED THE MESSAGE OR AUTHORIZED ITS RELEASE.
IF USED, IDENTIFIES THE MAPS FOR LOCATIONS REFERENCED IN THE MESSAGE.
PROVIDES THE SHIP NAME, NICKNAME AND RADIO CALL SIGN.
PROVIDES THE CENTRE FREQUENCY AT WHICH ELECTROMAGNETIC RADIATION OF ENERGY IS POSSIBLE.
PROVIDES THE PORT OF LOADING INFORMATION.
PROVIDES THE PORT OF ARRIVAL INFORMATION.
PROVIDES RETURN PORT INFORMATION.
IF USED, PROVIDES PLAN SERIALS INFORMATION IN FREE TEXT. NOTE: THIS INFORMATION MUST BE COMPLETED IF "CARGO INFORMATION" BELOW IS NOT INCLUDED.

PROVIDES DETAILS OF THE CONSIGNEE, STOWAGE CATEGORY AND LOAD TYPE OF THE CARGO ONBOARD. LINE REFERENCE NUMBERS SHOULD BE ENTERED IN ASCENDING ORDER. NOTE: THIS INFORMATION ELEMENT MUST BE COMPLETED IF "PLAN SERIALS" ABOVE IS NOT INCLUDED.

IPROVIDES LINE REFERENCE NUMBER (LRN), INTERNATIONAL MARITIME DANGEROUS GOODS INDICATOR AND OTHER DETAILS OF HAZARDOUS CARGO IN SET 1CARGO ABOVE. THE LRN SHOULD BE ENTERED IN ASCENDING ORDER, MATCHING THE LRN IN 1CARGO FOR THIS ENTRY.
